description: The file is a Dart source code for a Flutter-based Tic Tac Toe game app, implementing UI components, game logic, and state management.

classes.name: TicTacToeApp
classes.description: Root widget that sets up application theming and home screen.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: Main screen of the game with mode selection and score tracking.

classes.name: _HeaderSection
classes.description: A widget for selecting the game mode via toggle buttons.

classes.name: ScoreSection
classes.description: Displays the current game scores for X, O, and draws.

classes.name: TicTacToeBoard
classes.description: Main game board widget handling game logic, user interaction, and AI moves.

classes.name: _TicTacToeCell
classes.description: Represents a single cell in the game grid, rendering X/O and handling taps.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point which runs the Flutter app.

methods.name: _loadScores
methods.description: Asynchronous method to load game scores from shared preferences.

methods.name: _updateScores
methods.description: Persists updated game scores to shared preferences.

methods.name: _resetScores
methods.description: Resets game scores to zero and updates preferences.

methods.name: _onGameResult
methods.description: Handles game result and updates scores accordingly.

methods.name: _onModeChanged
methods.description: Changes game mode and resets the current game.

methods.name: _resetBoard
methods.description: Resets the game board for a new round.

methods.name: _showSnack
methods.description: Displays a SnackBar with a given message.

methods.name: _startNewGame
methods.description: Initializes or resets the game state for a new game.

methods.name: _handleTap
methods.description: Manages user tap on a cell, including AI move logic if playing against AI.

methods.name: _findBasicAIMove
methods.description: Simple AI logic to decide the computer's next move.

methods.name: _checkWinner
methods.description: Determines if there is a winner in the current board state.

methods.name: _showEndDialog
methods.description: Displays a dialog at game end with options to restart.

methods.name: _isWinnerCell
methods.description: Checks if a cell belongs to the winning combination for highlighting.

methods.name: _buildSymbolWidget
methods.description: Builds visual widget for X or O symbols in cells.
